name: Speed is Jump
description:
Made for the 3rd Blackthornprod Game Jam by Paulsen
All Assets (Music,Sound,Art,Programming) were made be me.

The idea is that you play a small wizard, fighing in a cave. But he has only a limited amount of magical power at a time, so he can either jump higher or walk faster.

Note: This was my first Game Jam and my first ever uploaded Unitygame.
Nether the less I hope these few levels and the story are exciting.
